Së bashku do të krijojmë një realitet vi: Together, we are building a new virtual reality.
Të bashkuar jemi më të fortë, ndaj bëhu: United we are stronger, so join the first decentralized community in Albania.
Një komunitet i decentralizuar është një: A network is a group of people or entities that share a common goal. When the network is centralized, it means that it is being governed by a close group of people or even one single person. When it is decentralized, that network has the ability to be governed by every member, making it more fair and democratic.
Cfare duhet të bëjë për të qenë pjesë e: What do I need to do to be part of Vial Community?
Për momentin është e nevojshme të regjis: You need to do 3 easy steps: Subscribe to our Social Channels, join and engage in our Discord Community and be part of Vial APP.
Kur do të hidhet në treg monedha e Vial?: In what period of time will the tokens be issued?
Informacion të detajuar mbi “tokenomics”: VIAL is driven by its own crypto asset – the VIAL token, which will be issued when the mainnet goes live. Its supply schedule will be progressively issued over the course of the next 100 years. You can find more details on tokenomics in our Whitepaper.
Vial nuk është para falas. Është një pro: Vial is not free money. It is a long term project, whose success is wholly dependent on its members contributing.
Rrjeti ka për qëllim të ndihmojë njerëzi: The network's main objective is to help expose ordinary people to an economic value that nowadays goes straight to third parties. Vial DAS depends on the collective contributions of the society.
Jo! Të gjithë janë të ftuar ti bashkohen: Yes! The Vial community and Vial app are open to anyone who wants to be part of it.
A është e nevojshme të mbledh pikë për t: How do I earn points ? Where do I collect them?
Së shpejti do të prezantohen një sërë më: You can earn points by performing certain incentivized actions in the ViAl app (like daily swipe, posting content, etc). Save these points because they will be redeemable with ViAl tokens when the network goes live.
Cili është vizioni i aplikacionit përsa: What will be the first decentralized applications (dApps) built on VIAL?
VIAL ka vizionin që brenda platformës të: To facilitate all the needs of a decentralized society, there needs to be a robust framework with various features and systems in order to ensure that people can communicate, work, and grow together. The vision that we have is for the VIAL Platform to have the following components:
Për çfarë shërben seksioni “Vial Voice”?: What can I do in Vial Voice, How can I use it?
Ju mund të lexoni përmbajtje edukative l: You can read educational content on crypto and blockchain (primarily), engage with other community members on your favorite topics, post content and also get rewarded by ViAl points for this activity. Points can be used in other ViAl apss or can be redeemed for ViAl tokens when the network goes live.
Kush mund të votojë në Vial?: Who can vote in the Vial app?
Të gjithë anëtarët që kanë një numër të: Everyone who will have a certain number of ViAl points can vote easily in the app.
A mund të krijoj një pyetësor në Vial?: Can I create a question for the voting section?
Ju mund të shtoni sugjerime për propozim: You can add suggestions about the next proposal, but the team will be the one to decide if a proposal should be voted upon. At least until the network goes live.
A më duhen “monedha Vial” për të votuar?: Do I need tokens to vote?
Për të votuar do të duhen vetëm pikë të: You will need to have ViAl Points to vote. On the ViAl blockchain you will need to have tokens.
Cili është qëllimi dhe vlera e Vial Poin: What is the purpose and value of Vial Points?
Në sistemin e brendshëm në komunitetin t: ViAl points is an internal system to incentivize and keep track of user’s actions. Since ViAl aims to be a blockchain economy, they will have value according to ViAl’s token price.
Mund të blej pikë me monedha fiat?: Can I buy points with fiat currency?
Pikët mund të grumbullohen vetëm duke qe: At the moment ViAl points can be earned only by participating in the ViAl app.
Platforma e Vial do të testohet dhe kont: ViAl blockchain platform will be battle-tested and audited before it goes live.
Cili eshte qellimi i komunitetit ViAL?: What will be purpose of Vial community?
Qëllimi i komunitetit do të jetë të anga: The purpose of the community or let’s say “society” will be to collaboratively and democratically engage and build the decentralized society that will govern their next reality powered by Web 3.
Pse duhet ti bashkohem Vial krahasuar me: Why should I join Vial compared to other platforms in Metaverse?
Ju duhet të jeni pjesë e Vial dhe të gji: You should be a part of ViAl and all the Metaverse platforms for as long as you find value that the respective communities are providing.
A mund ta rregjistroj biznesin tim në Vi: Can I register my business on Vial?
Për momentin jo, por është në planet afa: At this moment no, but it will be available on the next updates. Businesses will play a key role in ViAl.
A mund të tregtohet dhe këmbehet monedha: Will Vial have an exchangeable and tradable token?
Po. Nëpërmjet DEX (shkëmbime të decentra: Yes it will. Through DEXs (decentralized exchanges) first and then through centralized ones (like Kucoin, Binance, etc).
DAO quhet një Organizate Autonome e Dece: DAO means Decentralized Autonomous Organization. It is one of the many uses cases of blockchains where people can freely create governance structures on top of a smart contract platform to automate and secure decision making processes.
Smart contracts janë marrëveshje të kodu: Smart contracts are agreements coded in a system like blockchain where they are enforced automatically, without needing a third party to validate them.
Si do të rritet vlera e monedhës Vial?: How will the ViAl token accrue value?
Sa më shumë transaksione të ndodhin në s: ViAl token is a utility token that represents the economic activity happening in its blockchain. The more transactions happen in the tokenized society of ViAl the more valuable the ViAl token is due to its mechanics.
Kërkon të dish më shumë? Dërgo pyetjen t: Do you want to know more? Send your question and we will be back as soon as possible to you!
Na ndiqni në rrjetet sociale për me shum: Follow us on our social medias for more.
Ju lutem pranoni kushtet: Please accept the terms and conditions
Ju lutem plotësoni fushat me informacion: Please fill the fields with the respective information

Vendosni këtu emailin që do regjistrohen: Write the email you will use to register on our forum
